title: Smart Display Mirror
detail: A Smart Mirror that will display cool things on your mirror
extended_details: The Smart Mirror will display various widgets onto the mirror such as calendar, weather, and temperature. It will also utilize voice commands and video recognition to be more dynamic as well as customized to each user's preferences. The mirror will be powered with a Raspberry Pi 3 and will be displayed with a computer monitor + one way mirror.
